derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Latin studiosus, from studium 'painstaking application'

entry.def: Someone who is studious spends a lot of time reading and studying books.

example.ex: I was a very quiet, studious little girl.
example.tran: 我那时是个非常安静、勤奋好学的小女孩。
